DOC.brief_summary: This study identify change occur nervous system healthy normal volunteer learn cycle task . Healthy subject 18 year age old cycle 16 minute may eligible study . Candidates screen brief medical history physical examination . Participants assign one three group : - Complex training : Cycling 16 minute constant speed 60 rpm frequent change pedal resistance . - Simple training : Cycling 16 minute constant speed 60 rpm change pedal resistance . - No training : Remaining seat bike 16 minute perform exercise . Participants cycle 16 minute train task , plus 4 minute train . Reflexes measure nerve conduction study somatosensory evoke potential ( SSEP ) record training . Nerve conduction study measure speed nerve conduct electrical impulse strength connection nerve muscle . For study , probe place skin calf muscle knee deliver small electrical stimulus , wire tap skin record impulses . SSEP recording , measure excitability brain sensory stimulus , collect electrode place scalp . After train period , multiple train stimulation ( MTS ) apply 10 minute . For MTS , weak electrical current deliver 10 second every 10 second . These stimulus produce buzz sensation without pain , discomfort , muscle twitching . The MTS follow another 4 minute cycle . Participants also undergo transcranial magnetic stimulation ( TMS ) . For procedure , insulated wire coil hold scalp . A brief electrical current pass coil , create magnetic pulse travel scalp skull cause small electrical current brain cortex ( out part brain ) . The stimulation may cause twitch muscle face , arm , leg . The electrical activity muscle record computer record device , use electrode attach skin tape .
DOC.brief_title: Nervous System Function Normal Volunteers During Cycling Training

DOC.criteria: INCLUSION CRITERIA : Normal volunteer ( age 18 ) willing participate consider able cycle for16 minute base neurological physical exam . EXCLUSION CRITERIA : 1 . Subjects history heart condition , unresponsive arterial hypertension , diabetes , chronic back pain , sciatica , peripheral neuropathy , rheumatoid arthritis , active joint deformity arthritic origin , alcohol drug abuse , psychiatric disorder require hospitalization prolong treatment , head injury loss consciousness , epilepsy . 2 .
